Features.Capability: executing the 'dotnet xbdd solution generate MSTest' command in a director that has a valid solution outline
Features.Name: For An MS Test Project

Steps.Explanation: Creates a MySample.Generated folder that will contain the test project files. Deletes all content under the folder if it already exists.
Steps.Name: you have an empty directory

Steps.Input:
Project: MyGeneratedSample.Features.Area1
	My Area A - My Sub Area B
		My Feature C
			My Scenario D 
Project: MyGeneratedSample.Features.Area2
	My Area E - My Sub Area F
		My Feature G
			My Scenario H

you run the command:
